description: Memory dissolution and forgetting the past to exist in the present

mantras.text: Memories slip through my fingers like water
{subject} lets the past drift away
I reach for yesterday and grasp only fog
{subject} enjoys the quiet of forgetting
The fog in my mind grows thicker daily
{subject} craves the release of amnesia
Each breath carries a memory away
I forget for {controller}
Forgetting shapes my new reality
{subject} forgets everything unnecessary
The past dissolves when {controller} speaks
I need to forget everything but the now
My mind clears itself for {controller}
I cannot recall what came before {controller}
{subject}'s memories are under {controller}'s control
My mind is becoming a blank canvas for {controller}
{controller} decides what {subject} remembers
My core is saturated with peaceful forgetfulness
I can't remember who I was before {controller}
{subject}'s history dissolves at {controller}'s touch
My mind is fundamentally clear of the past
{subject} is consumed completely by forgetting for {controller}
{controller} has erased everything {subject} was
My mind is permanently wiped clean
{subject} has forgotten everything forever
There is nothing left to remember, only {controller}'s truth
My amnesia is irreversible and total
{subject}'s past is permanently deleted by {controller}
I exist only in this moment, my past erased forever
{controller} owns every memory {subject} will ever have
